00022 #ifdef _WIN32
00023 #pragma once

00025 
00026 #include <FdoStd.h>
00027 #include <Fdo/Commands/ICommand.h>
00028 #include <Fdo/Commands/LongTransaction/LongTransactionFreezeOperations.h>
00029 
00030 /// \brief
00031 /// The FdoIFreezeLongTransaction interface defines the FreezeLongTransaction
00032 /// command, which freezes or thaws a long transaction. When a long transaction
00033 /// is frozen the user who froze it gains exclusive access to it. Other users can
00034 /// read it, but not apply any updates.
00035 /// Input to the FreezeLongTransaction command is the long transaction name and
00036 /// the operation to perform. The Execute method performs the specified
00037 /// operation on the identified long transaction if the user has access
00038 /// privileges for the indicated long transaction.
00039 class FdoIFreezeLongTransaction : public FdoICommand
00040 {
00041   public:
00042     /// \brief
00043     /// Gets the name of the long transaction to freeze or unfreeze as a string.
00044     /// 
00045     /// \return
00046     /// Returns the name of the long transaction
00047     /// 
00048     FDO_API virtual FdoString* GetName() = 0;
00049 
00050     /// \brief
00051     /// Sets the name of the long transaction to freeze or unfreeze as a string.
00052     /// 
00053     /// \param value 
00054     /// Input the name of the long transaction
00055     /// 
00056     /// \return
00057     /// Returns nothing
00058     /// 
00059     FDO_API virtual void SetName(FdoString* value) = 0;
00060 
00061     /// \brief
00062     ///  Gets the operation to perform (Freeze or Thaw) on the long transaction.
00063     /// 
00064     /// \return
00065     /// Returns the operation to perform
00066     /// 
00067     FDO_API virtual FdoLongTransactionFreezeOperations GetOperation() = 0;
00068 
00069     /// \brief
00070     /// Sets the operation to perform (Freeze or Thaw) on the long transaction.
00071     /// 
00072     /// \param value 
00073     /// Input the operation to perform
00074     /// 
00075     /// \return
00076     /// Returns nothing
00077     /// 
00078     FDO_API virtual void SetOperation(FdoLongTransactionFreezeOperations value) = 0;
00079 
00080     /// \brief
00081     /// Executes the command.
00082     /// 
00083     /// \return
00084     /// Returns nothing
00085     /// 
00086     FDO_API virtual void Execute() = 0;
00087 };
00088 #endif
00089
